title: BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions ‍Expects Q4 Revenue To Be $59.5 Mln
text: March 19, 2018 / 1:33 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions ‍Expects Q4 Revenue To Be $59.5 Mln Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Staffing 360 Solutions Inc: * SEES Q4 REVENUE $59.5 MILLION (ADDS DROPPED WORD ‘SEES’) * SEES FY REVENUE $192.7 MILLION (NOT $500 MILLION) * STAFFING 360 SOLUTIONS ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR * SEES Q4 2017 REVENUE $59.5 MILLION * ‍SEES PRELIMINARY Q4 2017 NET LOSS OF $9.1 MILLION, INCLUDED $7.9 MILLION OF CHARGES​ * ‍EXPECTS TO FILE ITS AUDITED RESULTS FOR FY 2017 ON FORM 10-K BEFORE SEC FILING DEADLINE OF MARCH 30, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
